```
#!/bin/sh
LIST_OF_APPS="dstat lsof mailx rsync tree vim-enhanced git whois iptables-services"
yum install -y $LIST_OF_APPS
```

```
common.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - dstat
      - lsof
      - mailx
      - rsync
      - tree
      - vim-enhanced
      - git
      - whois
      - iptables-services
```

```
- name: install packages we need
  yum:
    name: "{{ item }}"
    state: "latest"
  with_items:
    - dstat
    - lsof
    - mailx
    - rsync
    - tree
    - vim-enhanced
    - git
    - whois
    - iptables-services
```
